summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3016, for the improvement of 39th Avenue South from Genesee Street to Conover Way, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and side sewers, therein; under Ordinance No. 36318 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
